residential_units.description: Erection of a rear roof extension; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side of the existing back addition; demolition of two storey lean-to storage room, to the rear elevation at ground and first floor level; installation of 1no. rooflight on top of the existing back addition at first floor level; installation of double glazed doors and a Juliet balcony to replace existing window, installation of a new painted timber sash window to replace existing window, to the rear elevation at first floor level; installation of glazed doors and windows to replace existing window, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; installation of 3no. windows following the removal of 2no. existing windows, to the side elevation at first floor level; installation of 2no. rooflights in the front roofslope; replacement of all existing windows with new painted timber sash windows, to the front elevation at ground and first floor level; installation of a new main front entrance panelled door to replace existing; alterations to the front boundary wall to include, rebuilding of the wall with the installation of metal railings on top; conversion of the existing building from 2no. self-contained flats into a single dwellinghouse.
residential_units.phase_detail: All sources checked. Started - BC initial notice ref.2021/01023/IND on 21 Sept 2021; property registered on Ctax gov website on 24/09/2021. SV shows completion
